groups.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue
groups.description: Configuration properties for Redis delay queue.

groups.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue.thread-pool
groups.description: Configuration for the delay queue thread pool.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue.enabled
properties.description: Whether the delay queue is enabled.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue.thread-pool.core-pool-size
properties.description: The core number of threads for the delay queue thread pool.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue.thread-pool.max-pool-size
properties.description: The maximum number of threads for the delay queue thread pool.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue.thread-pool.queue-capacity
properties.description: The size of the delay queue's thread pool queue.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue.thread-pool.keep-alive-seconds
properties.description: The time that threads should remain alive when idle, in seconds.

properties.name: thinker.cloud.redis.delay-queue.thread-pool.thread-name-prefix
properties.description: The prefix for thread names in the delay queue thread pool.
